content: I’m sorry but how is controlling your own company something bad? How are you on the side of the venture capitalist that wants to manage by numbers? And more so, who the fuck are you to wag your finger at how they conduct business in the first place? How entitled do you have to be to think a corporation should bow down to you? This article makes me sick. Your moral compass is broken. In a post trump world, good and evil is determined by how aligned with your ideology someone is, not by principles. Thank you for reminding me that tech news is just fake news with lensless plastic glasses.
